title: One Piece, Vol. 83: Emperor of the Sea, Charlotte Linlin
description: Luffy and crew land on Whole Cake Island to take back Sanji! Meanwhile, the preparations continue for Sanji’s wedding—including the arrival of the groom’s family! It’s gonna take more than luck for the Straw Hats to survive against the forces of Big Mom and rescue their crewmate!
author: Eiichiro Oda
